docs.title: ✨ Modern MkDocs Template
docs.text: Welcome to your new documentation site! This template is pre-configured with the best plugins and extensions for a professional experience.

docs.title: 🚀 Key Features
docs.text:
• 🌓 Dark Mode support is built-in and follows system preferences by default.
  • 📱 Mobile Friendly design that looks great on any screen.
  • 🔍 Instant Search with highlighting and suggestions.
  • 📊 Mermaid Diagrams for flowcharts, sequences, and more.
  • 🔡 Latex Math support via Arithmatex.

docs.title: 💡 Admonitions
docs.text:
Pro Tip

Use admonitions to highlight important information. They come in various flavors like note, abstract, info, tip, success, question, warning, failure, danger, bug, and example.

docs.title: 📑 Content Tabs
📉 Diagrams
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Plan] --> B[Write]
  B --> C[Deploy]
  C --> D{Happy?}
  D -- Yes --> A
  D -- No --> B

docs.title: 🔢 Math Equations
docs.text: When \(a \ne 0\), there are two solutions to \(ax^2 + bx + c = 0\) and they are $\(x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}\)$

docs.title: ✅ Task Lists
docs.text:
• Create project
  • Configure extensions
  • Write documentation
  • Profit!

docs.title: 🎨 Icons & Emojis
docs.text:
• Built for speed
  • Open source
  • Media friendly

docs.title: 🛠️ Getting Started
docs.text:
1. Install dependencies: 

    pip install -r requirements.txt

  2. Run locally: 

    mkdocs serve

  3. Build site: 

    mkdocs build

docs.title: Setup Guide
docs.text: This page explains how to get started with this template.

docs.title: Configuration
docs.text:
Edit mkdocs.yml to customize your site:

site_name: My Awesome Project

docs.title: Deployment
docs.text: Simply push to main or master branch to trigger the GitHub Action.
